definition: everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time

sentences.english: The 2.6.25 implementation will need to walk the retransmission queue from the start in order to find this data.
sentences.chinese: 的實現需要從起點遍歷重傳隊列以便找到數據。

sentences.english: An ergodic recursive Algorithm is suggested for the analyse of the reliability of distribution grid.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種分析配電網供電可靠性的遍歷遞歸算法。

sentences.english: It stores all the cells found along the way that make up the word.
sentences.chinese: 它存儲在生成那個單詞時所遍歷的所有細胞。

sentences.english: Just iterate over the array of property names looking for the audit fields.
sentences.chinese: 只需循環遍歷屬性名數組，尋找審計字段。

sentences.english: Loop over files in the current working directory.
sentences.chinese: 遍歷當前工作目錄下的所有文件。

sentences.english: Execute and traverse permission to the content administration page.
sentences.chinese: 針對內容管理頁面的執行和遍歷權限。

sentences.english: After obtaining the sheet object, move across the sheet and work with its data.
sentences.chinese: 獲取工作表對象後，遍歷工作表並處理它的數據。

sentences.english: But walking a tree just by using recursive functions is not all that difficult.
sentences.chinese: 但是隻用遞歸函數來遍歷樹並不十分困難。

sentences.english: This property of the quantum fluctuations is known in statistical mechanics as ergodicity .
sentences.chinese: 這個量子漲落的性質在統計力學中稱爲遍歷性。

sentences.english: Write function, the output graph traversal sequence.
sentences.chinese: 編寫函數，輸出圖的遍歷序列。

sentences.english: You can track focus traversal activity originated by the mouse.
sentences.chinese: 跟蹤由鼠標引起的焦點遍歷行爲。

sentences.english: This is certainly more convenient than the traversal methods I discussed.
sentences.chinese: 這無疑比我所討論的遍歷方法更方便。

sentences.english: Given a binary tree, return the postorder traversal of its nodes' values. For exampl …
sentences.chinese: 原始題目如下，意爲後序遍歷二叉樹，不要用遞歸。

sentences.english: This paper deals with topologically ergodic maps.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究拓撲遍歷映射。

sentences.english: Some of the basic algorithm for data structure, such as trees, graph traversal and so on.
sentences.chinese: 一些數據結構的基本算法，例如樹，圖的遍歷等。

sentences.english: A future refinement of this code should consider looping through those values.
sentences.chinese: 此代碼的未來改進中應考慮遍歷這些值。
